definitions.definition: A means of providing the necessities of life for oneself (for example, a job or income ).
examples: an independent livelihood ;  to make / earn / gain / win a good livelihood by the sweat of one's brow

definitions.definition: Property which brings in an income; an estate .
The course of someone's life ; a person's lifetime , or their manner of living; conduct , behaviour .

main_definition: A means of providing the necessities of life for oneself (for example, a job or income ). [from 14th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( now rare ) Property which brings in an income; an estate . [from 15th c.]
( obsolete ) The course of someone's life ; a person's lifetime , or their manner of living; conduct , behaviour . [10th–17th c.]
